metadata.title: Lettre a M. l'évêque d'A-- et compagnie, auteurs de l'Adresse aux provinces.
metadata.creator: Suleau, François-Louis, 1758-1792.
Suleau, François-Louis, 1758-1792
Talleyrand-Périgord, Charles Maurice de, prince de Bénévent, 1754-1838
Montesquiou-Fezensac, François-Xavier-Marc-Antoine, duc de, 1757-1832
French Revolution Collection (Newberry Library) ICN
metadata.description: By François-Louis Suleau; addressed to the bishop of Autun, Charles Maurice Talleyrand-Périgord. Cf. Barbier
Adresse aux provinces attributed by Barbier to F.X.M.A. de Montesquiou-Fezensac; cf. Barbier, A.A. Ouvrages anonymes, I, column 71
Suggested date of publication based on another edition, published 1790. Cf. Barbier; Martin & Walter
Variant of Barbier, A.A. Ouvrages anonymes, IV, column 140
Variant of Martin & Walter. Révolution française, IV:1, 32021
Forms part of the French Revolution Collection at the Newberry Library
metadata.notes: Title page and cover are combined. Damaged, stained, marked and/or loose pages. Uneven binding. Skewed text.
